main.submsg: Get the VISALP apps and live consciously and productively every day.

prod1.description: Organize your files into folders based on their extensions!

prod2.title: DELcam
prod2.description: Take a photo in a separate gallery and set a timer for deletion!

goals.title: What is our goal?
goals.subtitle: To make each day effective
goals.description: We want to create products that make people's lives easier, increase productivity and awareness.

goal1.title: Simplicity
goal1.description: VISALP products aim to simplify and make more convenient the monotonous, repetitive tasks.

goal2.title: Mindfulness
goal2.description: We enable you to track the development of your mental and emotional health so you can recognize the patterns within.

goal3.title: Productivity
goal3.description: We give you the opportunity to regain and maintain your productivity and motivation.
